definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Syene, city on S. border of Egypt, toward Ethiopia, only in phr. ([[וְעַד־גְּבוּל כּוּשׁ]]) ´[[מִמִּגְדּׂל ס]] Ez Eze 29:10 cf. Eze 30:6, rd. prob. [[סְוֵ֫נׇה]] or < [[סְוׇ֫נׇה]] (Copt. Suan), c. [[ה]] loc. (JDMich Sm Co Berthol) = Egypt. Sun, Copt. Suan, mod. 0’aswa0n Aswân; LXX e)/wv Suhnhv; rd. prob. [[סְוׇן]] also Eze 30:16 (for MT [[סִין]] q.v.) LXX Suhnh.—See further Jos:BJ iv. 10, 5 Strabo:xxxii.817 – 820, Brugsch:Geogr. Inscr. i. 155; Reiseber. aus Aegypt. 247 Bd:Egypt. 4. 323 f. Budge:Nile 284.
